FIPS code |blank_info = 13-03440 |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = athensclarkecounty.com }} Athens is a town in the American state of Georgia. It is the county seat of Clarke County. The University of Georgia is in Athens. == References == == Other websites == * Athens-Clarke County: Unified City/County Government Official Site * Athens Convention & Visitors Bureau * Athens Stuff Guide * The University of Georgia Category:County seats in Georgia Category:Towns in Georgia (U.S. state)
